identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a professional yet emotionally resonant placement platform that replaces WhatsApp chaos with Zen-like organization.
identity.vibe: Professional Zen. Not boring corporate, but structured and calm.

usage.data: JetBrains Mono, text-xs, tracking-wide (for CGPA, IDs)

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grids.dashboard_admin: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-6 (Control Room Grid)
grids.dashboard_student: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 (Tetris Grid for Cards)

Card.style: bg-card border border-border/60 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200
Card.usage: Used for Job Drives, Stats, and Profile Sections.

variants.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 border-b border-white/20 (Use for Sticky Header)
visual_enhancers.gradients: No full screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in 'Hero' areas only.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for dropdowns/modals.

company_logos.instruction: Use Clearbit Logo API for company logos. Pattern: https://logo.clearbit.com/{domain}

empty_states.instruction: Use Lucide Icons with a large gray circle background for empty states.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for a refined look. Size 16px-20px for UI, 24px for navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE index.css with the provided CSS variables immediately.
3. USE 'Manrope' for all headings (h1-h3) and 'Inter' for body text.
4. IMPLEMENT the 'Control Room' grid for the Admin Dashboard (dense data).
5. IMPLEMENT the 'Tetris' grid for the Student Dashboard (card-based).
6. USE the provided image URLs for the login page and profile placeholders.
7. ENSURE all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
8. DO NOT use default Shadcn colors; use the Indigo/Teal palette defined above.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
